55.eng-name: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as stating that Allah the Most High and Exalted said:I am the One, One Who does not stand in need of a partner. If anyone does anything in which he associates anyone else with Me, I shall abandon him with one whom he associates with Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَشْرَكَ فِي عَمَلِهِ غَيْرَ اللَّهِ
